

```{r}
input<-read_lines("Day18Sample.txt")
```


```{r}
trap<-matrix(".",nrow=1,ncol=nchar(input)+2)
trap[1,2:(ncol(trap)-1)]<-unlist(str_split(input,""))
```

```{r}
trapfinder<-function(trp,rws){
  for(i in 2:rws){
    trp[i,(2:ncol(trp)-1)]<-sapply((2:ncol(trp)-1),function(x){
      if(trp[(i-1),(x-1)]==trp[(i-1),(x+1)]){"."}else{"^"}})}
  trp}

```

```{r}
p1<-trapfinder(trap)
p2<-p1[,2:(ncol(p1)-1)]
part2<-length(which(p2=="."))
part1
```
